Uji afya is a delightful blend of flavors, nutrition and cultural heritage, offering a taste of East Africa's culinary traditions while providing a nourishing and satisfying experience.

Visit our premises in the shown location to enjoy the famous uji afya and other various foods that we offer.

In our menu we also provide the sweet enticing hearty and versatile arrowroots alias nduma.

Come and sovor the warmth and cormforting aroma of our carefully selecting tea accompanied by sweetpotatoes making a true African meal.
